x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Around 92 million tonnes of textile waste are produced every year. We live in a society that loves shopping — and as our kids grow, their clothes no longer fit. Often, we end up throwing them away or donating them. This app aims to solve that problem by enabling clothing exchange, reducing waste, and promoting sustainability instead of letting good clothes end up in the garbage.
